pr_title: [#2029] Fix Command Router AMQP server vert.x context issues

timeline.message:
[#2029] Fix issues caused by different vertx contexts being used.

The CommandRouterServiceImpl is no Verticle anymore, therefore
there is no issue anymore with CommandRouterAmqpServer requests
ending up being handled on the wrong vert.x context.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>

[#2029] Fix issues caused by different vertx contexts being used.

The CommandRouterServiceImpl is no Verticle anymore, therefore
there is no issue anymore with CommandRouterAmqpServer requests
ending up being handled on the wrong vert.x context.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText:
how about adding this as the default implementation to org.eclipse.hono.service.amqp.AbstractDelegatingRequestResponseEndpoint?
It seems to make a lot of sense to register these checks automatically, doesn't it?
timeline.author: sophokles73

replies.bodyText: I also thought about this. But that would have implications on the hono-service-device-connection module and its usage of the DelegatingDeviceConnectionAmqpEndpoint class, where the given service implementation is already registered with the health check by other means (done in the Application class there).
replies.author: calohmn

replies.bodyText: I see, then let's keep it like this for the time being ...
